dict.key:
NSCalendarsUsageDescription</key Please grant permission to update calendar NSContactsUsageDescription</key Please grant permission to update contacts NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription</key Please grant permission to scan bluetooth devices NSAppleMusicUsageDescription</key Please grant permission to play music NSMotionUsageDescription</key Please grant permission to detect motion NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription</key Please grant permission to access location NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription</key Please grant permission to scan devices
NSCameraUsageDescription Please grant camera access to capture images NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription Your location is required to get current address NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription Needs Location to get current address NSMicrophoneUsageDescription Please grant microphone access to recognize speech NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription Please grant photo gallery access to choose photos NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription Please grant access to recognize speech UIApplicationSupportsIndirectInputEvents
